Description_lang: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for $d. Each strike has a $5761h% chance of poisoning the enemy, clouding their mind and slowing their attack and casting speed by $5760s1% for $5760d.
AuraDescription_lang: Each strike has a chance of poisoning the enemy, slowing their attack and spellcasting by $5760s1% for $5760d.

description_blz.en_US: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, clouding their mind and slowing their attack and casting speed by 15% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Cubre tus armas con un veneno no letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidad de envenenar al enemigo, lo que nubla su mente y reduce sus velocidades de ataque y lanzamiento un 15% durante 10 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Cobre a arma com um Veneno Não Letal que dura 1 hora. Cada acerto tem 30% de chance de envenenar o inimigo, ofuscando a mente dele e reduzindo em 15% as velocidades de ataque e lançamento por 10 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Überzieht Eure Waffen mit einem nichttödlichen Gift, das 1 Stunde lang an ihnen haften bleibt. Bei jedem Angriff besteht eine Chance von 30%, den Gegner zu vergiften, was seinen Geist umwölkt und so sein Angriffs- und Zaubertempo 10 Sek. lang um 15% verringert.
description_blz.en_GB: Coats your weapons with a Non-Lethal Poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 30% chance of poisoning the enemy, clouding their mind and slowing their attack and casting speed by 15% for 10 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Cubre tus armas con un veneno no letal que dura 1 h. Cada golpe tiene un 30% de probabilidades de envenenar al enemigo, nublar su mente y reducir un 15% su velocidad de ataque y de lanzamiento durante 10 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous enduisez vos armes d’un poison non létal qui dure 1 heure. Chaque coup porté a 30 % de chances d’empoisonner l’adversaire, ce qui embrume son esprit et réduit ses vitesses d’attaque et d‘incantation de 15 % pendant 10 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Impregna le tue armi con un veleno non letale che dura 1 ora. Ogni colpo ha una probabilità del 30% di avvelenare il nemico, annebbiandone la mente e riducendone la velocità d'attacco e di lancio d'incantesimi del 15% per 10 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Вы покрываете оружие несмертельным ядом, который действует в течение 1 ч. Каждый удар с вероятностью 30% отравляет противника ядом, на 10 сек. снижающим скорость атаки и применения заклинаний на 15%.
description_blz.ko_KR: 무기에 1시간 동안 유지되는 비치명독을 바릅니다. 매 공격 시 30%의 확률로 적을 중독시켜 10초 동안 정신을 흐리게 하고 공격 및 시전 속도를 15%만큼 감소시킵니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 在你的武器上塗抹非猛烈毒藥，持續1小時。每次攻擊都有30%的機率讓敵人中毒，使其心智反應遲鈍，攻擊和施法速度降低15%，持續10秒。
description_blz.zh_CN: 使用非致命药膏给一件武器浸毒，效果持续1小时。每次攻击都有30%的几率使敌人中毒，使其反应迟钝，攻击和施法速度降低15%，持续10秒。
